title: Days Gone Questions Answered - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.25.19
description:
Get your first refill pack free at http://quip.com/games

Boost is only available at http://experian.com/kfgames.

Get 10% off your first order at http://brooklinen.com with promo code: GAMES

Andrea and Greg are here to answer your Days Gone questions, Barrett is here to rub Persona 5 Scramble in Greg's face, and Nick is here for some reason, too.

Time Stamps - 
00:01:55 - Housekeeping
It’s Avengers Day! MCU In Review on Tuesday!
Kinda Funny Gamescast is taking over the Borderlands 3 Reveal! Pre- and Post-shows hosted by Fran, Andrea, and Greg! 9:30 a.m. Wednesday May 1st.
Vancouver Meet and Greet - May 4th - kindafunny.com/events
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:Tom Bock, Black Jack, James Davis, and Mohammed Mohammed.
The Roper Report   -
00:04:00 - Persona 5 S is Persona 5 Scramble: The Phantom Strikers, Mike Higham @ GameSpot
00:07:05 Best Friend Q. - With the announcement of Persona 5 Scramble, if this sells well on Switch, do you think the natural next step is to finally port Persona 5 to the Switch? - Nick Metzger
00:11:25 Best Friend Q. - Do you guys think that the level of hype surrounding the idea of a switch port is justified? Do you even think that they're working on a port for Persona 5? - Kam
00:16:12 - FortniteXAvengers
00:19:38 - Where are my Weekly Apex Updates? Alissa McAloon at Gamastura
00:28:00 - Inching Closer to Mario Kart Tour, Matthew Handrahan @ GIB
00:29:18 - Saved By the Bell, SVU, Zena Games! Todd Spangler @ Variety
00:32:15 - Out today
00:36:47 -  Quip
00:38:05 - Experian
00:39:42 - Brooklinen
00:41:18 - BREAKING NEWS: Nintendo not planning to show off new hardware at E3 - Variety
Reader mail   -
00:47:15 - What about Days Gone grabbed your attention? - Evan M
00:50:40 - I have a question about something I see all the time on social media. People mostly outside of the gaming industry i.e. fans get very upset when a game they are anticipating but haven’t even played yet get negative or neutral reviews. Why is this? - Elijah Miller
00:55:45 - Is it weird that Sony allowed Days Gone to release like this? Poor performance, poor writing, bland gameplay...it's not very first-party Sony-like and yet, it still released? - Wesley LeBlanc
00:59:10 - Squad Up:Kevin Bogues(PS4) - KevinBogues
01:00:04 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host: Fran and Tim
